latest_release.name: v2.6.1 - Add warning for x64 on apple silicon runners

definition.name: Setup Julia environment
definition.description: Setup a Julia environment and add it to the PATH
definition.author: Sascha Mann

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: The Julia version to download (if necessary) and use. Use a string input to avoid unwanted decimal conversion e.g. 1.10 without quotes will be interpreted as 1.1. Examples: "1", "1.10", "lts", "pre"

inputs.name: include-all-prereleases
inputs.description: Include prereleases when matching the Julia version to available versions.

inputs.name: arch
inputs.description: Architecture of the Julia binaries. Defaults to the architecture of the runner executing the job.

inputs.name: project
inputs.description: The path to the project directory or file to use when resolving some versions (e.g. min)

outputs.name: julia-version
outputs.description: The installed Julia version. May vary from the version input if a version range was given as input.

outputs.name: julia-bindir
outputs.description: Path to the directory containing the Julia executable. Equivalent to JULIA_BINDIR: https://docs.julialang.org/en/v1/manual/environment-variables/#JULIA_BINDIR
